title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions
OB: The MRU (Most Recently Used) File List is not maintained between sessions.
EB: The MRU File List should be persisted and retained between sessions.
SR: 1. Launch the application.2. Open several different files.3. Close the application.4. Relaunch the application.5. Check the File menu and observe if the previously opened files are listed in the MRU File List.
